meanings.definition: A person who adheres to or advocates functionalism.
meanings.sent1: The functionalist explained how everything in society serves a purpose.
meanings.sent2: The functionalist believed that every aspect of a system has a specific function.
meanings.sent3: The functionalist joked that even their morning coffee mug was a vital part of society.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, the functionalist was like the conductor of a symphony, ensuring all parts worked together harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The functionalist's dedication to efficiency made them stand out in the workplace.

meanings.definition: Relating to or based on the principles of functionalism.
meanings.sent1: The functionalist approach focused on practical solutions to everyday problems.
meanings.sent2: The functionalist design of the building emphasized simplicity and utility.
meanings.sent3: The functionalist style of the house made it easy to maintain and clean.
meanings.sent4: Her functionalist mindset helped her streamline her workflow and increase productivity.
meanings.sent5: The functionalist perspective highlighted the importance of functionality over aesthetics.
